section.title: Flags
section.text:
[![Latest Stable Version](https://poser.pugx.org/donatj/flags/v/stable.png)](https://packagist.org/packages/donatj/flags) [![Total Downloads](https://poser.pugx.org/donatj/flags/downloads.png)](https://packagist.org/packages/donatj/flags) [![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/donatj/Flags.png?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/donatj/Flags)
Flags is an argument parser inspired by the Go-lang [Flag](http://golang.org/pkg/flag/#Parsed) package, taking its methodology but attaching a **GNU-style** flag parser.
---
Flags supports the following style of parameters:
Long-Flags `--key=value` / `--key value`
Short-Flags `-v`
GNU Style Multi-Short-Flags `-Xasd`
Multiple of the Same Short-Flag `-vvv`
As well as the ` -- ` operator for absolute separation of arguments from options.
